channel.title: Homes on Kirill Gavrilyuk
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kirill Gavrilyuk

item.description: Biography Kirill Gavrilyuk is a Ph.D. candidate in Machine Learning and Computer Vision supervised by Cees Snoek at the University of Amsterdam, QUVA Lab. He is mainly interested in video and action understanding. His main passions are sport and card games. He likes traveling, history and understanding new things. You can find the full CV here.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching assistant for the following courses at the University of Amsterdam: Deep Learning, 2016 Deep Learning, 2017 Information Visualization, 2017 I also co-supervised two BSc theses: Joop Pascha, Predicting Image Appreciation with Convolutional Neural Networks, 2016 Banno Postma, Game Level Generation with Recurrent Neural Networks, 2016
